abstract: Peace has broken out between Google and Microsoft, which agreed to dismiss all of their pending patent lawsuits against each other.
snippet: Peace has broken out between Google and Microsoft, which agreed to dismiss all of their pending patent lawsuits against each other.
lead_paragraph: Peace has broken out between Google and Microsoft, which agreed to dismiss all of their pending patent lawsuits against each other.

headline.main: Microsoft and Google Call an End to Patent Battles
